#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<vector>

int uniquePaths(int A, int B, vector < vector <bool> > &c) {

    vector < vector <int> > a(A, vector <int> (B) );
    for(int i=0; i<B; i++){
        if(c[0][i]==0)
            a[0][i]=1;
        else break;
    }
    for(int i=0; i<A; i++){
        if(c[i][0]==0)
            a[i][0]=1;
        else break;
    }

    for(int i=1; i<A; i++)
        for(int j=1; j<B; j++){
            a[i][j] = (c[i][j]==1?0:(a[i-1][j] + a[i][j-1])%1000000007);
        }
    return a[A-1][B-1];
}

main(){
    int m,n,p;
    cin>>m>>n>>p;
    vector < vector <bool> > c(m, vector <bool> (n) );
    while(p--){
        int x,y;
        cin>>x>>y;
        c[x-1][y-1]=1;
    }

    cout<<uniquePaths(m,n, c);
}
